settings.title: How do I get started with your services?
settings.answer: Simply select the service or package that fits your needs from our Services page, then follow the instructions to upload your existing resume, cover letter, or LinkedIn profile (if applicable). Our team will start crafting your new documents right away!

settings.title: Can you help if I don’t have a resume or cover letter yet?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We’re here to build a resume or cover letter from scratch. Just provide us with details about your experience, skills, and job goals, and we’ll handle the rest.

settings.title: How long does it take to complete my resume, cover letter, or LinkedIn profile?
settings.answer: Our standard turnaround time is 3 to 5 business days, but if you need it sooner, we also offer rush services for an additional fee.

settings.title: How do I upload my current resume or LinkedIn profile for updates?
settings.answer: When you place your order, you’ll have the option to upload your existing documents. We’ll review your current materials and give them a fresh, professional update.

settings.title: What if I need both a resume and a cover letter?
settings.answer: You can choose one of our bundle packages, such as the Essential Package, which includes both a professionally crafted resume and a tailored cover letter at a discounted rate.

settings.title: Can I request revisions if I’m not fully satisfied?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer up to two rounds of revisions at no additional charge to ensure you’re 100% happy with your documents.

settings.title: Do you provide a refund if I’m not satisfied?
settings.answer: Due to the personalized nature of our services, we do not offer refunds. However, we’re committed to your satisfaction and will work with you to ensure you’re happy with the final product.

settings.title: Can you help with resumes and cover letters for specific industries?
settings.answer: Yes! Our team has experience across a variety of industries, including marketing, finance, technology, and more. We tailor each resume or cover letter to fit the job and industry you’re targeting.

settings.title: How does your subscription plan work?
settings.answer: Our subscription plan offers ongoing support for job seekers. You’ll receive a fresh cover letter, resume update, or LinkedIn optimisation every month to keep your materials up to date as you apply for new roles.

settings.contact_info_text: Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.
